response.original_title: 世にもエロスな物語～蜜愛～
response.overview: The 1st story, Sayaka is raped by the new neighbor, then he takes pictures of the rape and blackmails her. She had no choice but to do as the man told her. She was ordered to masturbate in front of the mirror, exposed naked in the garden, and made to perform fellatio on the delivery man. Sayaka was surely transformed into a sex slave. The 2nd story, Nanako works as a housekeeper for a loan shark to pay off her debts. Nanako is forced to spend the night with a man at Moriyama's command to repay the debt in place of her husband. The 3rd story, Asahi, a young wife, lets a man from a mold removal company into her house, and is raped on the spot,  and blackmailed. Asahi had no choice but to do as the man told her to do, and her body was thoroughly played with. She was raped in the hallway with lotion smeared all over her. Her body is trained in pleasure and humiliation "A vampire can't enter a house unless he's invited in. I entered your house because you invited me," says the rapist.
response.title: The World's Most Erotic Story: Sweet Love
